title: Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Haaram - A Timeless Bridal Adornment
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. High quality Diamond Simulants.
features: Elaborate Nakshi work depicting traditional floral motifs and peacocks (నెమలి). Centered with Emerald highlights and accented with dangling gold beads. The pendant features a symmetrical design with a central emerald and a striking drop. The necklace possesses intricate floral designs with central emeralds as highlights.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal for Seemantham and Half-Saree functions. Suitable for festive occasions like Ugadi and Sankranti.
description: This exquisite Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry. The handcrafted Nakshi work and high-quality emeralds create a piece that is both stunning and timeless. A perfect statement piece for the modern bride who appreciates tradition with a touch of elegance. Durable and a great investment.
